title: Anybody else getting no key drops?
body: Since they implemented the new way of dropping keys it seems that you get a lot less keys unless you continually get Honour Capsules... I started with about 6 chests sitting in my loot and now am sitting at 11... Am I the only one?

replies.body: Yeah same I never even get dropped any keys in games but I just assume i'm really freakin bad at the game so I just go with it. And tbh honor capsules shouldn't drop champion shards I hate that I have gotten only champion shards from 2 capsules they gave me.{{sticker:sg-janna}}

I believe keys now drop semi-'randomly', so as long as you play a game or two a day, Riot says that you should get the same amount of keys... That doesn't seem to be happening (at least in my experience), back when I was actually getting a few capsules, even though I was only getting champ shards, was the only reason I was getting enough keys. I mean, at least champ shards are better than nothing.... (unless you have all champs...)
Yeah I guess so but keys still don't drop that often and it's 7.20 now we'll just have to wait and see what happens
